scripts.setup: rm -rf ./package-lock.json && npm install && rm -rf ./Gemfile.lock && bundle install
scripts.test:examples:cucumber-watir: cd examples/watir && rm -rf ./Gemfile.lock && bundle install && bundle exec cucumber
scripts.test:examples:cucumber-selenium: cd examples/selenium && rm -rf ./Gemfile.lock && bundle install && bundle exec cucumber
scripts.test:examples:cucumber-capybara: cd examples/capybara && rm -rf ./Gemfile.lock && bundle install && bundle exec cucumber
scripts.test:examples:rspec-capybara: cd examples/rspec-capybara && rm -rf ./Gemfile.lock && bundle install && bundle exec rspec
scripts.test:examples: npm run test:examples:cucumber-watir && npm run test:examples:cucumber-selenium && npm run test:examples:cucumber-capybara && npm run test:examples:rspec-capybara
